posts.post_content:
PSA 2 Mathewson Portrait SOLD Really clean card other than middle of back looks like tad glue and little paper loss.  Amazing eye appeal.

SGC 1.5 Johnson hands at chest SOLD. Amazing card with eye appeal just little pin hole at the top

SGC 3.5 Mathewson Dark Cap SOLD  Really nice card has a partial double name on top.

All prices will include tracked bubble mailer shipping.  Paypal friends please goods is fine just add 3%.  Sold comment trumps on going negotiations.  PM is fine if you prefer email mine is [url]dkiekhefer@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks for looking.
Both mattys sold just Johnson left
